name: [Toru8P] Waven Chibi Style Lora
description:
Lora for generating images stylized as waven chibi characters.
Trained with danbooru tags.

If you like my work and want to buy me a coffee :')
(updated link to ko-fi)

This Lora were trained with same dataset as hypernetwork. But due additional options in kohya scripts i can manage training better. I will update this Lora if people will like results of my attempts.

Tags that might help with desired look, classes from waven game:
1. Cra
2. Eniripsa
3. Iop
4. Osamodas
5. Sacrier
6. Sram
7. Xelor

Also i modified emotion prompts like:
1. Happy
2. Sad
3. Scared

If u want to achieve good results - better to use additional tags like colored skin or bandages. Only those trigger words will not help you to find good looking result.

Also, please, use "turn pale" and "gloom (expression)" in negative due 2/3 of dataset images were with those emotion effects. I will try to improve it in future updates

modelVersions.name: wavenchibi lora v1.0
modelVersions.description: First iteration of my attempt to achieve waven chibi style

meta.prompt: <lora:waven-chibi-races-and-emotes:1>, eniripsa, chibi, blue hair, healer's robe, happy
